name: Vegan Caldo Tlalpeño Recipe
description: This vegan caldo tlalpeño recipe will keep you coming back for more. Zucchini, potatoes carrots and rice simmer in a chipotle vegetable broth

recipeInstructions.text: Heat a large pot to medium-low heat. Add 1/4 of water (or 1 tbsp. oil), add onions and sweat for 3-4 minutes until tender and translucent. Add garlic and let cook for 1 more minute
recipeInstructions.name: Heat a large pot to medium-low heat. Add 1/4 of water (or 1 tbsp. oil), add onions and sweat for 3-4 minutes until tender and translucent. Add garlic and let cook for 1 more minute

recipeInstructions.text: Pour in vegetable stock and cilantro sprigs in a large pot, and bring to a simmer.
recipeInstructions.name: Pour in vegetable stock and cilantro sprigs in a large pot, and bring to a simmer.

recipeInstructions.text: Add rice and simmer for 4 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Add rice and simmer for 4 minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: Add potatoes and simmer for 4 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Add potatoes and simmer for 4 minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: Add carrots and simmer for 4 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Add carrots and simmer for 4 minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: Add chipotle in adobo and zucchini and simmer for 5 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Add chipotle in adobo and zucchini and simmer for 5 minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: Add chickpeas and simmer for 6-7 minutes or until all the vegetables and rice are tender.
recipeInstructions.name: Add chickpeas and simmer for 6-7 minutes or until all the vegetables and rice are tender.

recipeInstructions.text: Serve with avocado cubes and lime wedges.
recipeInstructions.name: Serve with avocado cubes and lime wedges.
